message.content:
{"id": "2940", 
"title": "Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor", 
"description": "It takes a long time (30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table. Busy cursor should be shown.",
"OB": "When updating the checked state of the table, the process takes approximately 30 seconds. During this time, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the system is processing the request.",
"EB": "N/A",
"SR": "To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:\n1. Open a workspace with many projects.\n2. Click on the 'Export Zip' option.\n3. Select all the projects.\n4. Choose a file type or types.\n5. Press 'OK'."
}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
